title: Overview
content: Crafting is largely a buyable skill for P2P players. The fastest training methods involve purchasing materials from the Grand Exchange and processing them in bulk. Portable crafters (from Treasure Hunter) grant a 10% XP bonus and are highly recommended.
The skill has a wide range of training methods — dragonhide bodies are the fastest and most commonly used method from level 63 onwards.

title: Levels 1-20: Leather Items
content: Use soft leather to craft basic leather items for fast early XP.
- Levels 1-5: Leather gloves (13.8 XP each)
- Levels 5-14: Leather boots (16.3 XP each)
- Levels 14-20: Leather bodies (25 XP each)
Soft leather is made by tanning cowhides at a tanner for 1 coin per hide, or purchased directly from the Grand Exchange.

title: Levels 20-54: Battlestaves
content: Attaching elemental orbs to battlestaves is a cheap and steady mid-level training method.
- Attach unpowered orbs or elemental orbs to battlestaves for around 100 XP each
- Battlestaves can be purchased from the Grand Exchange or Zaff in Varrock (daily stock)
- XP rate: approximately 50,000–60,000 XP/hour
Some elemental battlestaves (fire, water, earth, air) may offer a slight profit depending on market prices.

title: Levels 40-63: Cutting Gems
content: Cutting uncut gems on a Portable crafter is fast and can be profitable depending on current prices.
- Levels 40-55: Rubies (85 XP each) — commonly used for good XP at lower cost
- Levels 55-63: Diamonds (107.5 XP each) — highest gem XP, worth the extra cost
Always use a Portable crafter for the 10% XP bonus. Gems are widely available on the Grand Exchange.

title: Levels 63-99/120: Dragonhide Bodies
content: Crafting dragonhide bodies is the fastest Crafting XP available from level 63 and remains the top method all the way to 99/120.
- Levels 63-71: Green dragonhide bodies (186 XP each)
- Levels 71-77: Blue dragonhide bodies (210 XP each)
- Levels 77-84: Red dragonhide bodies (234 XP each)
- Levels 84-99/120: Black dragonhide bodies (258 XP each) — best standard Crafting XP rate
Buy tanned dragonhides directly from the GE to save time. Use Portable crafters for 10% bonus XP. With portables, rates can exceed 350,000–400,000 XP/hour.

title: Levels 75-99: Harps at Prifddinas (AFK Alternative)
content: Playing harps in the Ithell Clan district of Prifddinas is a very AFK-friendly method, albeit slower than dragonhide bodies.
Requires completion of Plague's End. XP rate: approximately 60,000–75,000 XP/hour.
Harps also generate crystal flakes used to recharge crystal equipment, providing a useful Ironman-friendly side benefit.

title: Boosts and Tips
content: - Portable crafters: 10% bonus XP on all Crafting actions — the most important boost
- Modified master crafter's outfit: Up to 6% bonus XP from the full set
- Pulse cores: 10% bonus XP for a limited time — best used during dragonhide body crafting
- Double XP events: Significantly reduce the number of hides needed; stock up before events
- The Crafters' Guild provides a useful bank chest near a range for quick leather operations
